===Overview===
The '''Palandorians ''' is a [[human]]  tribe that lived in the [[Savage Land]], in the city of [[Palandor]] and rode the giant lizards. They were occasionally the victims of winged reptilian [[Beast-Men]] called the [[Klantorr]]. {{r|Savage Tales #9}}

===Events===
Palandorians were known to make human sacrifices during the reign of [[Omell (Earth-616)|Queen Omell]]. The sacrifices stopped when a Dinosaur kept in the "Pool of Death"" - agitated by [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]] - destroyed the temple and killed the Queen. {{r|Savage Tales #9}}
